mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM mon_device_alarm AS mda LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS ede ON mda.app_id =ede.app_id LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eet ON ede.equipment_int = eet.equipment_int
and eet.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and ede.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and mda.warn_type like '%${warnType}%'
and mda.warn_grade like '%${warnGrade}%'
and mda.occurrence_time >= #{startTime}
and mda.occurrence_time <= #{endTime}
